   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   '   s   t   _   t   w   i   t   t   e   r   _   l   a   r   g   e   '       &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   '   s   t   _   f   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   _   l   a   r   g   e   '       &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   '   s   t   _   e   m   a   i   l   _   l   a   r   g   e   '       &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   '   s   t   _   s   h   a   r   e   t   h   i   s   _   l   a   r   g   e   '       &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;

   i   f   r   a   m   e       s   r   c   =   "   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   .   c   o   m   /   p   l   u   g   i   n   s   /   l   i   k   e   b   o   x   .   p   h   p   ?   h   r   e   f   =   h   t   t   p   s   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   w   w   w   .   f   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   g   h   o   s   t   s   o   f   t   o   m   j   o   a   d   &amp;a   m   p   ;   w   i   d   t   h   =   1   7   5   &amp;a   m   p   ;   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   6   2   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   l   o   r   s   c   h   e   m   e   =   l   i   g   h   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   s   h   o   w   _   f   a   c   e   s   =   f   a   l   s   e   &amp;a   m   p   ;   h   e   a   d   e   r   =   t   r   u   e   &amp;a   m   p   ;   s   t   r   e   a   m   =   f   a   l   s   e   &amp;a   m   p   ;   s   h   o   w   _   b   o   r   d   e   r   =   t   r   u   e   "       s   c   r   o   l   l   i   n   g   =   "   n   o   "       f   r   a   m   e   b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   b   o   r   d   e   r   :   n   o   n   e   ;       o   v   e   r   f   l   o   w   :   h   i   d   d   e   n   ;       w   i   d   t   h   :   1   7   5   p   x   ;       h   e   i   g   h   t   :   1   0   0   p   x   ;   "       a   l   l   o   w   T   r   a   n   s   p   a   r   e   n   c   y   =   "   t   r   u   e   "   &gt;   /   i   f   r   a   m   e   &gt;
